name: CUBE SHOOTER (Johnrasc)
description:
HEY HEY HEY!!!!!

A new game has arrive!

Btw this game is a endless game and this game is a 2D Platformer Shooting Game that has a lot of Geometric Shapes.

AND this game is actually made in just 1 Day!!!

YUP JUST ONE DAY!!!

You can download this for free or you can give me a donation

 it's your choice :D

Movement: A and D or Left Arrow and Right Arrow

Jump: Space Bar

Shoot: Left-Click

Ok that's all THANKS AND HAVE A NICE DAY!!!!

:D
